response.overview: This documentary tells the story of Causa Justa, a movement that succeeded in depoliticizing and transforming the dialogue on abortion in Colombia. Thanks to their efforts, the Constitutional Court decriminalized the voluntary interruption of pregnancy up to 24 weeks of gestation, placing the country among the most progressive in the world on this issue. Through interviews and conversations, the protagonists of these achievements, feminists of different ages, regions and organizations in the country, share how they made this goal, for which feminist women have fought for more than five decades, a reality.
response.title: La libertad es mi causa
